review_data.title: Accogliente

review_data.title: Perfect
review_data.content: The best corner bar in Old Town. The waiters are so chill and willing to help order the best meal possible. Loved it! Great memories.

review_data.title: Nice corner bar
review_data.content: Nice bar at the corner of the street to just hang out and have a few drinks if you are around or going by.

review_data.title: Great food, great experience!
review_data.content: Honestly one of the best bars around. Great italian food (even at later time when it’s hard to find food around town), great selection of wine and very gentle owner! Been there before and will for sure continue going!

review_data.title: Sehr gemütlich - mit super Weinauswahl!
review_data.content: Endlich war ich einmal in der Züri-Bar und sehr positiv überrascht. Die Bedienung war sehr nett und zuvorkommend. Die Weinempfehlung...More

review_data.title: Lovely evening
review_data.content: We had a lovely couple of drinks and a charcuterie platter here. It was not a problem to open the bottle of what every we wanted & we felt very comfortable. Staff more than happy to explain everything ( in beautiful English). If I lived...More

review_data.title: Zuri Bar has a huge facelift and a new concept
review_data.content: Zuri Bar has been completed revamped and is now called Divella Vini e Panini. We visited this eatery three times on our trip to Zurich. The wine Alessio, the new proprietor, served us comes from Puglia and was excellent. All the cured meats, olive oil,...More

review_data.title: Entspannte Bar
review_data.content: Super entspannte Bar für ein kleines Bierchen am Abend. Auch internationale Biere werden hier zu moderaten Preisen angeboten, sodass die...More

review_data.title: Quite neighborhood bar
review_data.content: One of the really few old bars in Zürich that are left the way they looked 40 years ago. The place has been refurbished and is changed a little bit from it's rough appearance before. The waitresses are now more mainstream and so is the...More

review_data.title: Gemütliche alte Bar
review_data.content: Eine sehr gemütliche alte Bar in der Altstadt von Zürich. Nette Cocktails und ein gutes Angebot an alkoholischen Getränken in...More

review_data.title: Classy Hangout
review_data.content: I believe that this is the oldest continuous bar in Zurich. Great service in cozy atmosphere. Good beer selection (only bottles though).

review_data.title: Yes, the ZuriBar is still open

review_data.title: Schöne alte Bar für einen Cafe oder Drink
review_data.content: Einrichtung ist wirklich alt, aber schön. Ideal für einen schnellen Cafe oder Drink während eines Stadtbummels.

review_data.title: Nice corner bar
review_data.content: First of all, my husband and I went to this bar because it was nearby and open. We ended up having a nice experience here and chatted with the friendly bartender (in English) for awhile as well. If you're downtown in Zurich on a weekday...More

review_data.title: The Oldest bar in town
review_data.content: Located in Niederdorf, this place is rumored to be the oldest bar in town. The Semi-circle bar has stools and there were also tables and chairs placed along the walls. The windows are filled with funky objects and when walking by from the outside it’s...More
